scripts.login: source config/config.${EnvName}.env && aws ecr get-login-password --region us-west-1 --profile ${AWSProfile} | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin 891449579858.dkr.ecr.us-west-1.amazonaws.com
scripts.tag: source config/config.${EnvName}.env && docker tag h2x-prod-web:latest ${WEB_REMOTE_IMAGE_TAG} && docker tag h2x-prod-worker:latest ${WORKER_REMOTE_IMAGE_TAG}
scripts.prep: source config/config.${EnvName}.env && sed "s#_IMAGE_NAME_#${WEB_REMOTE_IMAGE_TAG}#g" Dockerrun.aws.template.json > ${WEB_DOCKERRUN_FILE} && sed "s#_IMAGE_NAME_#${WORKER_REMOTE_IMAGE_TAG}#g" Dockerrun.aws.template.json > ${WORKER_DOCKERRUN_FILE}
scripts.push: source config/config.${EnvName}.env && docker push ${WEB_REMOTE_IMAGE_TAG} && docker push ${WORKER_REMOTE_IMAGE_TAG}
scripts.publish: source config/config.${EnvName}.env && run-s tag prep push
